```{r}
min_unique_prefix_length <- function(xs) {
  m <- str_split_fixed(xs, "", Inf)
  n <- 0

  while (ncol(m) != 0) {
    n <- n + 1
    this_col <- m[, 1]
    this_col <- this_col[this_col != ""]
    if (length(this_col) == length(unique(this_col)))
      break
    
    m <- m[, -1, drop = FALSE]
  }
  
  n
}

min_unique_prefix_length(c("apple", "app", "aptitude"))
```

```{r}
setdiff(c("H", ""), "")
```



### Tests

```{r}
test_that("All basic tests", {
expect_equal(min_unique_prefix_length(c("apple", "aptitude")), 3)
expect_equal(min_unique_prefix_length(c("apple", "app", "aptitude")), 4)
expect_equal(min_unique_prefix_length(c("", "")), 0)
expect_equal(min_unique_prefix_length(c()), 0) }
)
```
